name: TiffEncodingType

properties.description: LZW compression, which is lossless and most useful for images with large areas of single color.
properties.name: TIFFLZW

properties.description: JPEG compression, which is lossy and recommended for continuous-tone images, such as photographs.
properties.name: JPEG

properties.description: Zip compression, which is lossless and most effective for images that contain large areas of single color.
properties.name: TIFFZIP

description: The encoding to use when saving to TIFF format.
